# mpong

It's Pong, by me.

                                                                           
```                                                                          
┃                                                                         ┃
┃                                                                         ┃
┃                                                                         ┃
┃                                                                         ┃
┃                                                                         ┃
┃                                                                         ┃
┃                                                                         ┃
                                                                           
                                                                           
                                                                           
                                                                           
                                                                           
                                                                           
               ●                                                           
                                                                           
                                                                           
                                 Misses: 2 
```
<hr>

## Installation
`python3 -m pip install mpong`

## Usage
`python3 -m mpong.mpong`

## Tutorial
Use `wasd` to control both paddles. Press `q` followed by any key to exit.

##### Contents of requirements.txt
`readchar==3.0.5`

<sub>Part of the M-Commands Line</sub>
